#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
ll int h[256];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	ll int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		memset(h,0,sizeof(h));
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		ll int i,mc,l=s.length();
		for(i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			h[s.at(i)]++;
		}
		ll int mymin=INT_MAX;
		ll int mymax=INT_MIN;
		for(i=0;i<256;i++)
		{
			if(h[i]>0)
			{
				mymin=min(mymin,h[i]);
				mymax=max(mymax,h[i]);
			}
		}
		if((mymax-mymin)==0)
		{
			cout<<"SAFE"<<endl;
		}
		else if(mymax-mymin==1)
		{
			mc=0;
			for(i=0;i<256;i++)
			{
				if(h[i]==mymin)
				mc++;
			}
			if(mc==1)
			cout<<"INCREMENT"<<endl;
			else
			{
				mc=0;
				for(i=0;i<256;i++)
				{
					if(h[i]==mymax)
					mc++;
				}
				if(mc==1)
				cout<<"DECREMENT"<<endl;
				else
				cout<<"NOT POSSIBLE"<<endl;
			}
		}
		else
		cout<<"NOT POSSIBLE"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
